title: FS: Malarkey, "No malarkey" - SOLD - Malarkey No More
author: frankbmd

posts.post_title: FS: Malarkey, "No malarkey" - SOLD - Malarkey No More
posts.post_content:
This listing is not a bunch of malarkey, but merely a listing for a single Malarkey.  This single Malarkey has a Sovereign 350 reverse and is graded VG by PSA.  Asking $49.99 shipped net to me.  Your $50 bill will make my Bill your Bill, and that's no malarkey.  :confused::confused::confused: 

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-psa/10467/malarkey-sov[/IMG]

Thanks for looking. ;)

Frank,

Do you have any Bull Mularkey?

Mark
Good thing it sold before any kerfuffle ensued :D
